proposalEN: When the times and technology are constantly advancing, the law and the system must keep up as soon as possible in order to ensure the rights and interests of the people. Premise: All types of vehicles on the road are just means of transportation, and there is no distinction between high and low. Now we take motorcycles as an example for the public. Respect the safety of other passers-by, and the road should give way to pedestrians > bicycles > locomotives > heavy machinery > passenger cars > trucks > large trucks and above. Some passers-by's driver's licenses are exchanged for chicken legs, which is not friendly to other passers-by. Main text: The ban on locomotives in 1967 is still in use today. At that time, due to the low mobility of locomotives, in order to speed up the traffic flow, locomotives were banned during peak commuting hours instead of all-weather. There are only three countries in the world that implement the division of vehicle types, and Taiwan is one of them. Nowadays, motorcycles are highly maneuverable, but they can only drive in the outermost lane. They have to compete with buses, taxis, and vehicles parked on the side of the road. Does this bring safety or harm to motorcycle owners? Before implementing the speed diversion, please be sure to improve the traffic quality of the people! Expressway is an example of speed diversion, but has the essence of speed diversion been brought into play? So driving talent is the key, not the type of car, which is related to education, publicity, sanctions, and folk literacy, etc. Regardless of reform, improving the quality of national transportation is the first priority! From passenger cars, SUVs, jeeps, trucks, etc., vehicles have completed the change of small car fixed racks in accordance with the provisions of "Road Traffic Safety Regulations" Annex 15.
